text:
Hacktoberfest is back again!
Earn a cool shirt, by giving back with your skills. Contribute your knowledge/skills to open source projects, make the web a better place. Now is the time to learn git, learn github. Give back to tools and libraries you use regularly.

<https://hacktoberfest.digitalocean.com/|https://hacktoberfest.digitalocean.com/>
HubSpot is not affiliated with this event, I just personally am a fan.
